summary:
The Shack itself is at:
<br /><br />1.) Fast Travel to riverwood
<br /><br />2.) Turn left back towards the river,
<br /><br />3.) Behind you towards the left should be a shack the other side of the river
<br /><br />4.) Welcome to my first custom made mod.
<br />&l
descriptionHtml:
And basic suggestions? I'm open. Currently I'm working on a follower mod but I can't add custom armor from other mods. The armor I wanted to add is the Remodeled Armor mod which makes the armor more unique for females.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Once I get better at modding I will make tutorials and also I will make bigger more complex mods such as story quest mods.
<br /><br />I hope you do enjoy my basic little shack. Tell me if it's good for a starter please.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />
author: Adash AKA My new alias

files.name: Basic Riverside Shack (Riverwood)
files.changelogHtml:
Made random door downstairs into a room
Cluttered that room (W.I.P)
Changed Exterior to match Interior
Dimmed lighting a bit
(NOT DONE JUST NEEDED TO GET OUT THERE) Adding Clutter to main room(s)
